name: Rock Burial
effect:
Blocks. Deal 1 Rock type damage at the end of each Round. Lasts 4 Rounds. -1 Accuracy. 
 At Silver Rank, increase this move's base power to 2.
 At Gold Rank, this move's power is increased by an additional 3, while the user is above 50% HP.
 At Platinum Rank, increase this move's base power to 3.
 At Diamond Rank, increase the end of round damage by 1.
